School Notes

Faith Christian School attracts a diverse student body from 8 different counties and 100 different local churches. We integrate a biblical worldview into our curriculum, and over 90% of our graduates go on to attend college. We also prioritize our students developing their personal relationship with Christ through a transformative school experience.

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does Faith Christian School cost?

Faith Christian School's tuition is approximately $6,190 for private students.

What schools are Faith Christian School often compared to?

Faith Christian Schoolis often viewed alongside schools like Central Catholic Junior Senior High School, Lafayette Christian School by visitors of our site.

What sports does Faith Christian School offer?

Faith Christian School offers 12 interscholastic sports: Archery, Baseball, Basketball, Cheering, Cross Country, Golf, Soccer, Softball, Tennis, Track and Field, Volleyball and Wrestling. Faith Christian School is ranked as one of the top 20% of private schools in Indiana for most sports offered.

What is Faith Christian School's ranking?

Faith Christian School ranks among the top 20% of private schools in Indiana for: Largest student body and Most sports offered.

When is the application deadline for Faith Christian School?

The application deadline for Faith Christian School is rolling (applications are reviewed as they are received year-round).

School Reviews

Faith Christian School has been a great experience for our family. I love the fact that the teachers are called to teach and it is not just a job. The last two years our teachers have all been loving and supporting of our daughter. It is a blessing to see her not only learn academics but also about Christ. Having had experience with the public school system I would not go back to public. They have a lot to offer to parents in helping in the educational growth of our children. They keep us well informed and the facility is always nice and up to date.

5

FCS offers terrific and caring teachers! Our sons have been at the school now for 10 years. The academics are challenging and prepare them well for college. Our oldest son tested out of 15 credits when he went on to Purdue! We also liked that the other students treat each other with respect and Christian love. The school encourages students to wait on dating so the students don't feel the peer pressure to pair up until they are much older. The school encourages group activities instead. Faith has a wonderful music program. The concerts are a delight to attend. They also offer drama and art. Faith offers a large variety of sports for boys and girls and has won many championships. We would definitely send our children here again if we had to decide all over again.

- Posted by Parent - sanew

I would recommend this School! It's been a wonderful experience for our Son! He's in the 8th grade and has fit right in. All the Teachers and Staff have your child in their hands and handle it with love! We feel at home and wouldn't even think of leaving! Great School compared to TSC!!

Faith Christian School is a special place and unlike any other in the community. Having had personal experience with both the public school system and the Catholic school system, I can honestly say that Faith has so much more to offer. The culture within the school and at each school event is amazing. Everyone is held to the highest standards, those of humility and treating others the way we ourselves wish to be treated. This focus is embraced by staff and is imprinted on students and parents. I have never made a better investment in the well-being of my family.
